attributes.action: Holiday prices same all year round for educational workers.
attributes.additional_details: Prices are double the price and this effects how many educational staff can go away and give their children the experience of visiting other countries
attributes.background: Holiday prices to be the same all year round for education staff or provide a discount code for them to go in half term holidays

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about prices for holidays are a matter for travel agents and airlines, not the UK Government or Parliament.
